review: My intention was to buy it and use Amazon Instant Video and other Amazon Prime content. Well, it only works if you're in the US, not my case.Also installing apps outside the US is a real pain, you cannot install through the device (???).After hours and hours trying to get a good connection (did not work on my ASUS Dual-Band Wireless-N 600 Router RT-N56U, had to enable my ISP router, awful) and a few more hours trying to install some apps, I finally got a Netflix Streaming Device, 'cause it's basically all I can use it for.Other than that, it's fast and the controller is good, makes it easy to navigate. If you need to use the search function, you can use the phone app, which makes it a lot easier (nice feature).
